title: Stress and health study - data interpretation

content.question: Number of reported illnesses Week 1 Week 2 Week 3 High stress group 13 18 28 Moderate stress group 7 10 15 Low stress group 4 4 5 Dr. Gooden studied the effects of stress over time on health outcomes using three groups of fifty participants. Which of the following is true based on the table?

choices.label: The high stress group has been in the exhaustion stage of the general adaptation syndrome model for the longest time.
The low stress group has been in the exhaustion stage of the general adaptation syndrome model for the longest time.
The moderate stress group has been in homeostasis for the entire three weeks.
The number of illnesses reported in the high stress group indicate that they are in the alarm stage by week 3.

content.answer: The high stress group has been in the exhaustion stage of the general adaptation syndrome model for the longest time.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
